educatorsPage.shareExpertiseDesc: Are you a beauty professional with knowledge to share? Join our community of educators and reach students worldwide.

about.mainDescription: Luméra Beauty Academy is the premier global platform connecting beauty professionals with world-class educators through live, interactive learning experiences.
about.missionTitle: Democratizing Access to Premium Beauty Education
about.missionDesc1: We believe that geography should never be a barrier to excellence. Our platform bridges the gap between aspiring beauty professionals and the industry's most accomplished educators, regardless of where they are in the world.
about.missionDesc2: Through live, interactive sessions, we create an immersive learning environment that goes beyond traditional online courses. Real-time feedback, Q&A sessions, and hands-on demonstrations bring the classroom experience directly to you.
about.excellenceDesc: We curate only the finest educators and maintain the highest standards in beauty education.
about.accessibilityDesc: Premium education should be accessible to beauty professionals everywhere, at any stage of their career.
about.communityDesc: We foster a supportive global community where professionals learn, grow, and inspire each other.
about.ctaDesc: Whether you're looking to learn or to teach, there's a place for you here.

contact.mainDescription: Have a question or need assistance? We are here to help.
contact.contactInfoDesc: Reach out to us through any of the following channels.
contact.sendMessageDesc: Fill out the form below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.messageSentDesc: Thank you for reaching out. Our team will get back to you within 24 hours.

help.supportTeamDesc: Our support team is here to assist you with any questions.

becomeEducator.mainHeading: Share Your Expertise With the World
becomeEducator.mainDescription: Join our community of world-class beauty educators and reach students globally through live, interactive classes.
becomeEducator.globalReachDesc: Reach students in 50+ countries without leaving your studio. Build an international following and expand your brand globally.
becomeEducator.earnMoreDesc: Set your own prices and keep up to 80% of your earnings. Our top educators earn $10,000+ monthly through live classes.
becomeEducator.flexibleScheduleDesc: Teach when it works for you. Schedule classes around your existing commitments and work-life balance.
becomeEducator.step1Desc: Submit your application with your credentials and expertise.
becomeEducator.step2Desc: Our team reviews your application and verifies your qualifications.
becomeEducator.step3Desc: Set up your live classes with your preferred schedule and pricing.
becomeEducator.step4Desc: Go live and share your knowledge with students worldwide.
becomeEducator.aboutYouPlaceholder: Share your background, achievements, and why you want to teach on Luméra...
becomeEducator.applicationSubmittedDesc: Thank you for your interest in becoming a Luméra educator. Our team will review your application and get back to you within 3-5 business days.
becomeEducator.haveQuestionsDesc: Check our Help Center or reach out to our educator support team.
